a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTPolioIPVOnly (IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.IPV-only) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a polio vaccination according to the national immunization protocol * Decision Table: IPV-only (in countries, in polio-free regions, with a very low risk of importation and sustained high routine immunization coverage (DTP3 >90%) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTPolioIPVOnly

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Shold not vaccinate client for first IPV dose as client\'s age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first IPV dose.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 3"

def.name: Test Validation

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Shold not vaccinate client for first IPV dose as client\'s age is less than 6 weeks. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first IPV dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client for first IPV dose as client is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client for second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client for second IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for IPV vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client for third IPV dose as the latest IPV dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is due for IPV vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client for third IPV dose as the latest polio dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Polio immunization schedule is complete as client\'s age was more than 6 weeks when the primary series was started.Three polio primary series doses were administered. '
"Primary series is complete. Client is not due for IPV booster dose"

'Should not vaccinate client for IPV booster dose as the latest polio dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver when to come back for the booster dose.'
"Primary series is complete. Client is due for IPV booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client for IPV booster dose as three polio primary series doses were administered, client\'s age was 6 weeks when the primary series was started and the latest polio dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
'Polio immunization schedule is complete. Three polio primary series doses and a booster dose were administered.'
